comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Violet Heming (1894-1981) was an English actress who first came to Broadway to play Wendy in Peter Pan; she married an ex-Senator, Bennett Champ Clark, in 1945, with Harry S Truman as the best man in their wedding party. broadway.cas.sc.edu/index.php?action=showPerformer&id=49
